PL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://e5b685c89e687f6a83c0dd3a54de555f209edb170ec2951b1f529a8e15b6c929","dweb:/ipfs/Qma4N68QwZJeLiZzUdUZw4Nnj6vaavoQSNBa7roWLvZGwc"]}},"version":1}

implementation().details: The implementation can be instantiated via the `new` keyword, cloned via the minimal clones pattern (see [ERC-1167](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1167)), or proxied via the UUPS pattern (see [ERC-1822](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1822)).

returns._0: The address of the plugin implementation contract.

params._dao: The address of the installing DAO.
params._data: The bytes-encoded data containing the input parameters for the installation as specified in the plugin's build metadata JSON file.

returns.plugin: The address of the `Plugin` contract being prepared for installation.
returns.preparedSetupData: The deployed plugin's relevant data which consists of helpers and permissions.

params._dao: The address of the uninstalling DAO.
params._payload: The relevant data necessary for the `prepareUninstallation`. see above.

returns.permissions: The array of multi-targeted permission operations to be applied by the `PluginSetupProcessor` to the uninstalling DAO.

params._currentBuild: The build number of the plugin to update from.
params._dao: The address of the updating DAO.
params._payload: The relevant data necessary for the `prepareUpdate`. see above.

returns.initData: The initialization data to be passed to upgradeable contracts when the update is applied in the `PluginSetupProcessor`.
returns.preparedSetupData: The deployed plugin's relevant data which consists of helpers and permissions.

returns._0: Returns `true` if the interface is supported.

prepareInstallation(address,bytes).notice: Prepares the installation of a plugin.

prepareUninstallation(address,(address,a.notice: Prepares the uninstallation of a plugin.

prepareUpdate(address,uint16,(address,ad.notice: Prepares the update of a plugin.

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Checks if this or the parent contract supports an interface by its ID.
